about_the_game:
AVOID GAME – A Fast-Paced Dodge Action Challenge!

Take control of a nimble green square and test your reflexes in this fast-paced survival game! Your mission? Dodge an endless barrage of falling orange and gray squares that drop at different speeds and patterns. The longer you survive, the harder it gets—can you outlast the chaos?

Gameplay Features:

  • Simple, Addictive Gameplay – Easy to learn, but hard to master! Move your green square using simple controls to dodge the incoming hazards.

  • Dynamic Difficulty Scaling – As time passes, the falling squares increase in speed and density, keeping you on your toes!

  • Endless Survival Mode – No levels, no competition—just you versus the ever-intensifying challenge. How long can you last?

  • Minimalist Visual Style – Clean and simple pixel art ensures a smooth experience, letting you focus purely on the action.

  • Instant Action – No waiting, no menus—the game throws you into the action immediately. Every run is a fresh challenge!

Ready to test your reflexes? Challenge yourself in AVOID GAME and see how long you can survive!
